attributes.action: The nation demands Stephen Fry makes one more series of QI.
attributes.additional_details: QI fan. Couldn't wish for a better replacement than Sandi, but would love just one more series from wotsisname. I reckon Mr Fry has found Zeus.
attributes.background: Stephen Fry says he is quitting QI. Fair enough, but a tad sudden. We love Sandi, his replacement (though we can't all spell her surname). Please please please can Stephen does just one more series before he goes?

rejection.details: You could write directly to Mr Fry to make this request.
